verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: Take me passed the outer courts newline and through the Holy Place newline Passed the brazen alter, Lord I want to see Your face newline Pass me by the crowds of people newline The priests who sing Your praise newline I hunger and thirst for Your righteousness newline And it's only found one place

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: So take me in to the Holy of Holies newline Take me in by the Blood of the Lamb newline Take me in to the Holy of Holies newline Take the coal, cleanse my lips, here I am
